items.description:
Bolt Torque Tension  System - Computerized

Model: QSTS-3CCM
 Capacity: Torque: 20kNm
 : Force: 2500kN
 Suitable to test: M22 to M64
 Maximum Length: 60 – 600mm
 As per standards: ISO16047

Scope of Supply - bill of Material

1. Torque and Force Sensor
Model: QTFS – 01 CB 
Range: 
 Torque – 20kNm (1kNm - 20kNm) : 1 No.
 Force - 2500kN (250kN – 2500kN)  : 1 No.
 Accuracy: ± 1% of the reading
 (From 10 to 100 % of the rated capacity)

2. Rotary Torque Sensor : 1 No.
Model No.: QRTS – 101 
Torque: 5000Nm 
 Accuracy: ± 1% of the reading
 (From 10 to 100 % of the rated capacity) 

3. Digital Display Unit : 2 No.
Model: QDD – 01BV 
- 4 Channel Display Unit
- To read Torque in terms of Nm, kgfm & Force in terms of kN, kgf
- 4 ½ digits LCD display with Peak Hold facility
- To use with above Sensors connecting one at a time the resolution 
will be as follows
- For 20kNm resolution is 1Nm
- For 2500kN resolution is 0.1kN
- For 5000Nm resolution is 1Nm

3. Customized Software : 1 No.
- Torque vs Load
- Torque vs Angle
- Co-efficient of friction (K – Factor)
- Data – Excel, pdf, graphical

4.  Torque Tension Testing Rig  : 1 No.
 Model: BTM – 103
 Capacity: 20kNm & 2500kN
- Suitable to measure the Bolt Torque-Tension Size: 
 M - 22 to M - 64 using various models
- Ideal for measuring and analyzing threaded fastener characteristics in 
production lot testing, R&D studies and quality control
- Easy to perform laboratory evaluation of applied torque and fastener 
tension characteristics during rundown operation
- The system is Self-supported rigid structure consisting of Torque tension 
sensor module with a facility to test Bolts of various sizes and length, 
motorized worm and worm wheel reduction gear box for application of 
torque and a PLC controlled unit
- Simultaneous display of applied Torque and Tension
- Facility to set Tension or Torque values, so that motor stops 
rotation
when set value is reached
- Provided with Variable speed adjustment
- Easy to remove Torque-Tension Sensor and indicator for recalibration
- Two mode of operation manual (Inching) and automatic
- Suitable for bolt length 60 – 600mm
- Provided with Gearbox
- Provided with axial aligning guides

5.  Rigid Table to mount the Bolt on the Testing Rig.  : 1 No.
Provided with storage facility to house the spare sensors & Other Tools.

6.  Control Panel : 1 No
Features of the Control Panel
- PLC controlled and motorized operation.
- High speed and low speed control of the set torque for faster and 
accurate calibration.
- Inching operation to set the position of the hex drive of the torque 
sensor to the bolt.
- Automatic emergency stopping to avoid overloading of the torque 
sensor.
- Separate display to set the torque value to switch over from high 
speed to low speed.
- Control panel consists of START, STOP, CLOCKWISE, 
COUNTERCLOCKWISE, INCH –SLOW, INCH-FAST, EMERGENCY 
STOP, ON- OFF MAINS push button controls, SERVO unit.
- Designed to simulate the torque application conditions with 
minimum physical effort and enhanced safety for the technician 
assuring a more accurate measurement.
- Designed to suit majority of bolts available with a torque value 
20kNm

7. Suitable Adapters : 4 No.
(for additional Adapters Cost will be Extra)

Torque wrench calibration system - 4000Nm 

Sensor - 4000Nm

Scope of Suuply for Torque Wrench Calibration System

1.a. Torque Sensor
Model: QTS – 01U
Range:
•	4000Nm       	-1No
Accuracy: ± 0.5% FSD
1.b. Digital Display Unit     
Model: QDD – 01BV
Channel Display Units with Timer (As per ISO 6789:2017) 
To read Torque in terms of Nm, kgfm & lbft
4 ½ digits LCD display with Peak Hold facility & First Peak facility  To use with above Sensors connecting one at a time
The resolution will be as follows 
For 4000 Nm resolution is 1Nm 
Compatible with above sensors.
                    Operates on 230V 10% 50Hz AC. Mains

1.c. Torque wrench Testing Rig
Capacity: 4000Nm
-	Ideal for checking torque wrenches & Hand torque tools,
-	Provided with L plate to hold the Square tube with sliding adopter to adjust the length as per Torque wrench size, and also provided with ‘C’ clamp for height adjustment of Torque Wrench during testing.
-	Provided with Gearbox, hand wheel etc.,
-	Provided with axial aligning guides to eliminate bending Moment of the sensor during testing.

1.d. Rigid Table 
To mount the Torque Wrench Testing Rig.	
Provided with storage facility to house the spare sensors & Other Tools.
1.e. Control Panel
        Features of the Control Panel
-	PLC controlled and motorized operation.
-	High speed and low speed control which enables to set High speed up to 80% and low speed up to 20% of the set torque for faster and accurate calibration.
-	Inching operation to set the position of the square drive of the torque sensor to the torque wrench.
-	Automatic emergency stopping to avoid overloading of the torque      sensor.
-	Separate display to set the torque value (say 80% of the set torque) to      switch over from high speed to low speed
-	Control panel consists of START, STOP, CLOCKWISE, COUNTER CLOCKWISE, INCH –SLOW, INCH-FAST, EMERGENCY STOP, ON- OFF MAINS push button controls.
-	A.C. Drive unit & Potentiometer to set First Speed and Second Speed.
-	Designed to for simulation of the torque application conditions with  minimum physical effort and enhanced safety for the calibration technician assuring a more accurate calibration.
-	It enables quick and easy torque wrench calibration and presetting, independent of human influence or sensor side and end load factor.
-	Provided with holding arm along with adjustable clamp (length & height wise) to adjust the different size and ranges of Torque Wrench during calibration.
-	Designed to suit majority of torque wrenches available with a torque value 400 to 4000 Nm
-	The design allows for easy interchange of torque sensors.

Note:
1. Calibration Certificate:
We are issuing the NABL Accredited Laboratory Certificate traceable to National Standards with measurement uncertainty for Torque only.
2. Manual: 
One instruction manual will be provided along with the equipment which will cover, functional, operational and maintenance requirement.
3. Warranty Certificate: 
Certificate will be issued for One year for any manufacturing defect from the date of supply.

Channel Display Units with Timer (As per ISO 6789:2017) 
To read Torque in terms of Nm, kgfm & lbft
4 ½ digits LCD display with Peak Hold facility & First Peak facility  To use with above Sensors connecting one at a time
The resolution will be as follows 
For 4000 Nm resolution is 1Nm 
Compatible with above sensors.
                    Operates on 230V 10% 50Hz AC. Mains

1.c. Torque wrench Testing Rig
Capacity: 1000Nm
-	Ideal for checking torque wrenches & Hand torque tools,
-	Provided with L plate to hold the Square tube with sliding adopter to adjust the length as per Torque wrench size, and also provided with ‘C’ clamp for height adjustment of Torque Wrench during testing.
-	Provided with Gearbox, hand wheel etc.,
-	Provided with axial aligning guides to eliminate bending Moment of the sensor during testing.

1.d. Rigid Table 
To mount the Torque Wrench Testing Rig.	
Provided with storage facility to house the spare sensors & Other Tools.
1.e. Control Panel
        Features of the Control Panel
-	PLC controlled and motorized operation.
-	High speed and low speed control which enables to set High speed up to 80% and low speed up to 20% of the set torque for faster and accurate calibration.
-	Inching operation to set the position of the square drive of the torque sensor to the torque wrench.
-	Automatic emergency stopping to avoid overloading of the torque      sensor.
-	Separate display to set the torque value (say 80% of the set torque) to      switch over from high speed to low speed
-	Control panel consists of START, STOP, CLOCKWISE, COUNTER CLOCKWISE, INCH –SLOW, INCH-FAST, EMERGENCY STOP, ON- OFF MAINS push button controls.
-	A.C. Drive unit & Potentiometer to set First Speed and Second Speed.
-	Designed to for simulation of the torque application conditions with  minimum physical effort and enhanced safety for the calibration technician assuring a more accurate calibration.
-	It enables quick and easy torque wrench calibration and presetting, independent of human influence or sensor side and end load factor.
-	Provided with holding arm along with adjustable clamp (length & height wise) to adjust the different size and ranges of Torque Wrench during calibration.
-	Designed to suit majority of torque wrenches available with a torque value 100 to 1000 Nm
-	The design allows for easy interchange of torque sensors.

Note:
1. Calibration Certificate:
We are issuing the NABL Accredited Laboratory Certificate traceable to National Standards with measurement uncertainty for Torque only.
2. Manual: 
One instruction manual will be provided along with the equipment which will cover, functional, operational and maintenance requirement.
3. Warranty Certificate: 
Certificate will be issued for One year for any manufacturing defect from the date of supply.
